question: What is the correct recipe for a large almond milk Brunette Chiller?

answerChoices.choice1: 4 scoops Brunette, 4 espresso shots, fill to the 12 oz line with almond milk
answerChoices.choice2: 4 scoops Brunette, 4 espresso shots, fill to the 16 oz line with almond milk
answerChoices.choice3: 2 scoops Brunette, 2 scoops chocolate, 4 espresso shots, fill to the 16 oz line with almond milk
answerChoices.choice4: 2 scoops Brunette, 2 scoops chocolate, 4 espresso shots, fill to the 12 oz line with almond milk

question: What is the correct recipe for a medium half-sweet oat milk Blondie Chiller?

answerChoices.choice1: 2 scoops Blondie, 2 espresso shots, fill to the 12 oz line with oat milk
answerChoices.choice2: 1 1/2 scoops Blondie, 2 espresso shots, fill to the 9 oz line with oat milk
answerChoices.choice3: 3 scoops Blondie, 2 espresso shots, fill to the 9 oz line with oat milk
answerChoices.choice4: 2 scoops Blondie, 2 espresso shots, fill to the 9 oz line with oat milk

question: What is the correct recipe for a large decaf mocha chiller?

answerChoices.choice1: 4 scoops chocolate, 4 decaf espresso shots, fill to the 12 with mocha mix
answerChoices.choice2: 4 scoops chocolate, 4 decaf espresso shots, fill to the 12 with whole milk
answerChoices.choice3: 4 scoops chocolate, 4 decaf espresso shots, fill to the 16 with whole milk
answerChoices.choice4: 4 decaf espresso shots, fill to the 12 with mocha mix

question: What is the correct recipe for a large hot skinny vanilla mocha?

answerChoices.choice1: 1/2 scoop vanilla, 1/2 scoop dark chocolate, quad shot espresso, Mocha Mix
answerChoices.choice2: 1 scoop sugar-free vanilla, 1 scoop sugar-free chocolate, quad shot espresso, skim milk
answerChoices.choice3: 1 scoop vanilla, 1 scoop chocolate, quad shot espresso, skimn milk
answerChoices.choice4: 1/2 scoop sugar-free vanilla, 1/2 scoop sugar-free chocolate, quad shot espresso, skim milk
